How many people are affected by Sandhoff disease ?,"Sandhoff disease is a rare disorder; its frequency varies among populations. This condition appears to be more common in the Creole population of northern Argentina; the Metis Indians in Saskatchewan, Canada; and people from Lebanon.",GHR,Sandhoff disease
